description:
The summer heat is unbearable when a power outage puts all air conditioners out of commission.  Koyuki teaches Fuyuki and Natsumi the ninja arts of surviving the heat without technology, while the frogs hatch a plan of their own.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Shinryaku mo Shouene de ne de Arimasu / Keroro Inaka ni Mukete Totsugeki Seyo! de Arimasu
Some Like It Scorching and Miserable!
Économie d`énergie / Keroro part à la campagne
ケロロ 侵略も省エネでね であります / ケロロ 田舎にむけて突撃せよ! であります
